pahalos koti panas lakshayak waya karamin beruwala, dodamgoda, ha bombauwala pradeshayanhi marga rasak kapat kara sanwardhanaya kare.dirgha kalayaka sita abalanwa pawathi marga rasak maha marga niyojya amathya nirmala kothalawala mahathage maga penwima yatathe melesa prathisanskaranaya kara thibe.katukurunda nagoda pradhana margayada athuluwa bommbauwala marga dolahakda beruwala marga pahak da wiwidha adiyarayan osse me wana wita sanwardhanaya kara atha.gulanakanda, palayangoda, koshena, withanawaththa, mihiripanna, kohilawaththa yana marga digu kalaka sita dadi lesa abalanwa pawathina athara eewa adiyara kihipayakin nima kirimatada apekshithaya..
prashnaya:- aanduwe amathiwaru kohomada wipakshaye wyapruthiyakata sahaya denne?
rate wyapara anshaya ayawaya sambandhayen yahapath prathichara dakwana wita, athamunge wiwechanaya wune "aayojakayan ena hati balamuko" kiyalayi.
api obe game pasala haduwa.
eeka dakapu prekshakagaraye kattiya sadda karayi kiyala mata hithunath ee ayata etharam eeka danila naha.
aya wenuwen apata karannata kiya kisiwak natha.

sambandhan atawani parlimenthuwe wipaksha nayaka lesa theri pathwiya.

amerikawa wani balagathu ratak thawath rataka abhyanthara gatalu sambandhayen mewani yojana idiripath kirima barapathala waradak bawa da ema ratawal penwa deyi. amerikawa shri lankawa sambandhayen gena eemata yana mewani yojana men ma ema yojana sammatha karaganima sandaha thama ratin aadhara upakara labaganna ratawalwalata balapam kara balahathkarayen sahaya labaganimata ganna kriyamarga da kisisethma anumatha nokarana bawada ema ratawal prakasha kara siti.

13 ekala jesus wahanse snawaka johan wisin bawthisma-snapanaya karaganu labana pinasa galilaye sita jordanata wadama kala seka-. 14 eheth-, johan un wahanse walakwamin-, oben bawthisma-snapanaya la,ya yuththe mama ya; eheth, oba ma wetha ena sek dayi asi ya. 15 jesus wahanse ohuta uththara demin, danata ida denna; mese dewa kamaththa mulumanin itu kirima apata sudusu yayi wadala seka-.
